message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase a unique product. I believe it's a game-changer and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $1,200,000.
Alice, thanks for the offer. However, that price is quite a bit higher than I'm willing to go. I'm interested in the product, but I'd need to see it closer to $600,000 for it to make sense for me.

I understand that $600,000 is a bit lower than I was hoping for, but I'm willing to meet you in the middle. I'm thinking of a price of $900,000. It's a fair price considering the value this product will bring to your business.
Alice, I appreciate you meeting me a bit, but that's still a pretty big gap for me.  I can go up to $700,000 if you're willing to work with me on this.

I'm getting closer to your price, Bob, but I'm still not quite there. I'm willing to meet you at $850,000. This is as low as I'm willing to go, but I think it's a fair price considering the product's value.
Alice, this is getting close!  I can tell we both see the value here. I'm willing to bump my offer to $750,000 to get this done today.
I'm glad we're getting closer, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $800,000. This is a very competitive price, and I think it's a great opportunity for both of us to make a deal.
